Half-Life 2 needs no introductions. It is heralded as one of the greatest PC games ever made. It collectively blew the minds of the masses when it released all the way back in 2004. This game is a masterclass in linear FPS game design. The controls are tight, the movement feels great, and the level design is near perfection. There is a lot of variety, from wildly different locales to explore, a fair amount of puzzle solving (mostly physics-based), driving, and great shooting encounters. The gravity gun, which lets you grab objects in the environment, is a blast to wield. From cutting up crab zombies with saw blades to throwing barrels at unsuspecting foes, it provides a great wrinkle to game play. It's a modern masterpiece. If you haven't got around to it, what are you waiting for? You should totally see what the hype was all about. It still holds up in ways that many classics just simply don't.

Half Life 1 got me deep into gaming, but this master piece here made me who I am today. If I didn't install Steam and made friends from different countries in Deathmatch, I would still be the person from a small village with much less knowledge in life. 
Once again I was thrown into a world unknown, walking around and witnessing such beautiful dystopian atmosphere. This time with even more stunning visuals and most importantly, god damn source engine. 
"Pick up that can" is the definition of beautiful psychics in games.
I didn't expect the story to change this much from such a simple yet beautiful idea, but I'm glad it did. It expands beautifuly with two more episodes and Combine are the best invading "alien species" in games and movies yet to this day.
Engine, story, characters, maps, everything is just perfect. (I admit I still get ptsd from boat part but its just another good flex of game engine)
Soundtrack is even more beautiful than the first game. Kelly Bailey is such an amazing artist. 
I just hope I can play Alyx soon, or I'll lose my mind.
Historia foda
Best game in the world. HL-3 please. (Alyx doens't count that is VR >:( )

This is the earliest Steam game to have achievements and trading cards. For the OCD completionists who care about playing games in chronological order, or crescent ID order, this is where you begin to earn achievements and cards.

The other games that precede this game in order by ID, but have no Achievements/Badges/Cards, are:
- Counter-Strike
- Team Fortress
- Day of Defeat
- Deathmatch Classic
- Half-Life: Opposing Force
- Ricochet
- Half-Life
- Counter-Strike: Condition Zero
- Codename Gordon
- Counter-Strike: Condition Zero Deleted Scenes
- Half-Life: Blue Shift

Time, Mr. Freeman?


Is it really that time again?


There's a reason why so many people consider this the finest shooter ever made. Just play it and you'll find out.

PS: the episodes are also reeeeally good play themmmm
Played again in 2020 and it still holds up as one of the greatest single player games of all time

Bazen düşünüyorum, Valve Half-Life 2'nin üzerine ne katıp bir devam oyunu geliştirebilir diye? O kadar mükemmel bir oyun. Half-Life 3 çıkacaksa eğer, her konuda o kadar iyi olmalı ki, bu sıradan monitörlerde oynadığımız oyunları anlamsız bırakmalı. O kadar mükemmel olmalı ki, bir insanın bir oyundan bekleyebileceği her şeyi karşılamalı. PC, Konsol ya da mobil, kullandığımız bu tek boyutlu ekranlarda oynanabilecek en iyi oyun olmalı. O kadar iyi olmalı ki, bu sıradan insan-makine arayüzünü ve bu arayüz için geliştirilmiş oyunları anlamsız bırakarak insanları oyun için VR gibi platformlara itmeli. O kadar iyi bir oyun olmalı ki, Doom'un başlattığı bu 3D oyun devrini, hatta sıradan ekranlardan oynanan oyunların devrini kapamalı. İşte bir devam oyunundan bize bunları beklemememizi sağlıyorsa o oyun, mükemmeldir.

하프라이프 1의 후속작입니다. 
발전된 물리엔진과 이를 이용한 퍼즐 그리고 몰입감 있는 스토리와 레벨 디자인을 가진 2004년 게임이며, 1의 사건 이후 외계종족 콤바인이 세운 17번지구에서 벌어지는 일을 다루고 있습니다.

만약 이 겜을 끝까지 다 하신다면 여러분은 3을 기다리기 시작할 겁니다...  10/10
